description: The Government of Canada is seeking bids for a ground penetrating radar system to detect underlying rebar and other structures, as required for the Department of National Defense.
full_summary:
> # Government Tender Announcement

## Details

*   **Title (English):** W355B-248238 Ground Penetrating Radar System
*   **Title (French):** W355B-248238 Géoradar
*   **Reference Number:** WS4480469818-Doc4557807239
*   **Amendment Number:** 2
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS4480469818
*   **Publication Date:** April 26, 2024
*   **Tender Closing Date:** May 29, 2024, 2:00 PM EVT
*   **Amendment Date:** May 21, 2024

## Related Information

*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** None
*   **Tender Status:** Expiré (Expired)
*   **GSIN:** None
*   **UNSPSC:** 41115200
*   **UNSPSC Description:** Radar and sonar systems and components

## Tender Information

*   **Notice Type:** Demande de propositions (Request for Proposal)
*   **Procurement Method:** Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner (Competitive - Open bidding)
*   **Selection Criteria:** Prix le plus bas (Lowest Price)
*   **Trade Agreements:** Accords Commerce Canada (Canadian Free Trade Agreement [CFTA])
*   **Region of Opportunity:** None
*   **Region of Delivery:** Nouvelle-Écosse (Nova Scotia)

## Contracting Entity Information

*   **Contracting Entity Name (English):** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contracting Entity Address (English):** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
*   **Contracting Entity Address (French):** 11, rue Laurier, Phase III, Place du Portage

## Contact Information

*   **Contact Name (English):** Petten, Genevieve
*   **Contact Email (English):** genevieve.petten@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Access to Tender documents

You can find more information on this tender at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19528307?extsite=MTk1MjgzMDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== (Please ensure you have an active Government of Canada Profile
